title: Circular dependency when reviewing linking on physics

content.raw:
Currently, `gazebo_physics` library needs to link against `gazebo_physics_${engine}` since they are using the `GZ_REGISTER_PHYSICS_ENGINE` macro which generate the definition for previous declarations of `Register${engine}()` functions.

So, we need to link `gazebo_physics` against the other `gazebo_physics_${engine}` libraries. There is currently no linking declared in `gazebo_physics_${engine}` against `gazebo_physics` although it is really using symbols from it.
